$type? {}{Indeks WWWOFFLE - Indeks g³ówny} $type?=outgoing{Indeks WWWOFFLE - Strony do pobrania}{} $type?=monitor {Indeks WWWOFFLE - Strony monitorowane}{} $type?=lasttime{Indeks WWWOFFLE - Strony ostatnio pobrane}{} $type?=prevtime{Indeks WWWOFFLE - Strony poprzednio pobrane ($subtype)}{} $type?=lastout {Indeks WWWOFFLE - Strony ostatnio oznaczone do pobrania}{} $type?=prevout {Indeks WWWOFFLE - Strony poprzednio oznaczone do pobrania ($subtype)}{} $type?=http {Indeks WWWOFFLE - $type://$subtype}{} $type?=ftp {Indeks WWWOFFLE - $type://$subtype}{} $type?=finger {Indeks WWWOFFLE - $type://$subtype}{} $typesubtype=$type$subtype $type?=prevtime{$type=$type$subtype $subtype=}{} $type?=prevout{$type=$type$subtype $subtype=}{} $typesubtype?=http{$type=$type/}{} $typesubtype?=ftp{$type=$type/}{} $typesubtype?=finger{$type=$type/}{} $subtype?{$subtype=/$subtype}{}

WWWOFFLE - Eksplorator Offline World Wide Web

WWWOFFLE: Indeks bufora
